subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: During the regular season, it was hard to find a team more risk averse on the basepaths than the Mets. But in the National League Championship Series, Manager Terry Collins has unshackled his troops.
snippet: During the regular season, it was hard to find a team more risk averse on the basepaths than the Mets. But in the National League Championship Series, Manager Terry Collins has unshackled his troops.
